title: vertical scroll for zoom in/out
message:
vertical scroll for zoom in/out

also modified horizontal flip algorithm to better respond to touch events.

title: added support for applying supported color effects
message:
added support for applying supported color effects

flinging back and fwd to apply supported color effects by the
current camera.

title: make sure Views are updated in UI Thread on cancelCapturing
message:
make sure Views are updated in UI Thread on cancelCapturing

refactored View-specific methods into a separate method. In cancelCapturing
method, I check whether or not current thread is the UI thread. If not,
I call the refactored method inside the runOnUIThread method.

title: started using actionbar compat library
message:
started using actionbar compat library

removed an early library I was using for the action bar compatibility.

title: fixed two issues
message:
fixed two issues

* fixed bug with upside down images on front facing camera.
* prevent from phone using a low resolution image.
    there could be a radiogroup to select the desired picture size.

title: resizing the invisible number on the lower panel
message:
resizing the invisible number on the lower panel

also changed colors in the lower panel to make them more consistent
with the upper panel.

title: shrink bottom panel
message:
shrink bottom panel

refactored bottom panel into its own layout and wrapped it in a view
group called TransportViewGroup. Inside this class, I declared a private
Animation class to shrink and expand this bottom panel.
Also removed the capture button from this bottom panel, so now it is
actually on top of the bottom panel and it remains static as the bottom
panel animates.

title: changed capture button type from Button to ImageButton
message:
changed capture button type from Button to ImageButton

instead of showing text based numbers, now showing transparent images.
to invoke a sense of photo creation action. in default state, the button
shows plus sign. so material!

title: removed target and min sdk declaration from manifest
message: removed target and min sdk declaration from manifest

title: added a small trick to animate photos on swipe up and down
message: added a small trick to animate photos on swipe up and down

title: set full scroll orientation based on position
message: set full scroll orientation based on position

title: set different padding values based on version
message: set different padding values based on version

title: using a new algorithm to create thumbnails
message:
using a new algorithm to create thumbnails

to have consistent thumbnail sizes, now I check the thumbnail size.
storing portrait and landscape thumbnails separately, which is probably
not a very good idea. I will come back to this idea and find a better
solution.

title: added random scroll values to gallery items
message: added random scroll values to gallery items

title: changed listview to gridview on gallery layouts
message:
changed listview to gridview on gallery layouts

I am changing listview to gridview, so that gallery layout will show
two columns of photographs in landscape orientation. I believe the
screen looks better that way.
renamed port_gallery to alt_gallery as portrait indication of the prefix
is misleading now.

title: update to latest version of donations module
message: update to latest version of donations module

title: better preview size algorithm. fixes #1
message:
better preview size algorithm. fixes #1

using a better preview size algorithm

using containing layout dimensions to calculate preview size

title: created demand mode for creating strips
message:
created demand mode for creating strips

added an image button to switch between timer mode and demand mode.
in demand mode, long-pressing capture button will enable capturing and
the app creates the composite picture when user takes four pictures in
a row.
added a new ImageButton for changing the mode
added longPress event for the capture button to start and stop sessions
in demand mode.
refactored pre-capture commands into a method
renamed revertViews method to cancelCapturing

title: fixed mp3 freeze on repeated captures
message: fixed mp3 freeze on repeated captures

title: added multiple screen support for image display layout
message: added multiple screen support for image display layout

title: added icons, using TouchImageView to display pictures
message: added icons, using TouchImageView to display pictures
